name: Pushp
description:
Pushp is a relaxing puzzle game which compares the theme duality with two sides of coin.

Rules : 
=> Create islands matching with the shape given and bloom all the flowers.

Controls :
=> Left and Right mouse click to change between water and land (Tap / Hold and Drag)


Hints : 
=> Refer the video walkthrough if you are stuck on a level.

Note :    There are few known bugs in the game but they wont block game progress. Let me know if you encounter any game breaking bugs. o_o
